title: The H-graph with unequal masses in quantum field theory
authors: Philipp Alexander Kreer and Stefan Weinzierl
abstract:
We compute the family of Feynman integrals related to the H-graph with
unequal masses in relativistic quantum field theory. We present an
$\varepsilon$-factorised differential equation for the 40 master integrals. The
alphabet consists of 29 dlog-forms with algebraic arguments, involving six
square roots. As these square roots are not simultaneously rationalizable, we
express the master integrals in terms of iterated integrals. In addition, we
express the H-graph with unit powers of the propagators up to weight four in
terms of multiple polylogarithms in compact form.
